B. big - While this word can imply size, it doesn't necessarily indicate a large quantity in the context of "a little."
C. more - This word suggests an increase but does not specify a large quantity.
D. plenty - This phrase also indicates a sufficient or large quantity.
E. much - This word can be used to describe a large quantity, but it is less specific than "lot of" or "plenty."
